channel.title: Transformers 4 on Game6r
channel.description: Recent content in Transformers 4 on Game6r

item.title: Big Hero 6 Bay Max Surgery
item.description: The Decepticon army attacks the science center, which contains a huge supply of Energon. A small team of robots is forced to accept an unequal battle and protect warehouses with precious energy. Choose one of the members of the Autobot squad, go to the battlefield and try to destroy the army of traitor robots and their commanders.

item.title: Go Robots
item.description: Optimus Prime sent one of his motorbots deep into the depths of Antarctica, where he needs to find nine parts from a long-lost superdrill. Help the brave hero of this game to get through the snowy mountains, collect the maximum number of energy cubes and find all the parts of the drill.

item.title: Robot Maker
item.description: A galactic army of robotic invaders from a distant Iron Planet has attacked Earth’s cities. As one of the elite pilots-transformers you go to protect your home planet. Try to break through the ranks of the infantry of alien warriors, destroy the enemy’s main base and destroy the commander of the iron aliens.
